Remark: Analysis of improvements from quaternion to classic 
Average of improvements in processing time (%)
mean -> 52.549030771001966 
median -> 51.0896072812685 
minimum -> 49.64423986582848 
maximum -> -10.937624662646936 
geometric mean over means -> 52.307181906141764 
samples classic -> [100000, 100000, 100000, 100000, 100000, 100000, 100000, 100000, 100000, 100000, 100000, 100000, 100000] 
samples quaternion -> [100000, 100000, 100000, 100000, 100000, 100000, 100000, 100000, 100000, 100000, 100000, 100000, 100000]
